interval.description: How often this lifecycle policy should be evaluated. `1`, `2`,`3`,`4`,`6`,`8`,`12` or `24` are valid values. Conflicts with `cron_expression`. If set, `interval_unit` and `times` must also be set.

intervalUnit.description: The unit for how often the lifecycle policy should be evaluated. `HOURS` is currently the only allowed value and also the default value. Conflicts with `cron_expression`. Must be set if `interval` is set.
